title: The Time We’ve Spent Together
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Hey, Dia. Could you pass that to me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yeah, here’s your pen.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Thank you. ......Alright, wrote that down. Oh yeah, did you watch that episode yesterday?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>The 9 o’clock detective drama? Of course, Ruby and I watched it. That was such a heart-wrenching episode.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Kanan-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>No, I was just wondering how you got through it. I’m still processing all of it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>......Yeah, I’m still thinking about it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Could we hang out for a little longer today~? Ahaha.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Of course. But! Kanan-san, it’s not good for you to dwell over it too long.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Okay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
